item.description:
For anyone wanting to get a bite prior
Meet at 5 pm at Portland Pie Company
14 Railroad Square, Nashua

Then at 7 PM we can go up as a group to see
Neil Simon's RUMORS

Update on tickets;
I have reserved 18 tix for us. The seats are right center in rows D to G, these are normally $17 but we are getting them for 12 (as long as there is over 15). But due to it being held as 1 order it would be easiest if everyone could pay in cash at the box ofice when we pick up the tix.

 

The theater is about 2 blocks away.

change

please indicate if you be joining us at Portland Pie Co or will meet us at the theater.
item.how_to_find_us: at the Rest check with the hostess for RobertO's table./ or Meet in the Lobby at the theater.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Let's Take in a way OFF Broadway Play in Nashua
